September 22, 2024 - In November 2004, GB Merchant Partners partnered with the company's founders as part of a leveraged recapitalization. In February 2008, the brand was acquired by G-III Apparel Group, Ltd. (NASDAQ: GIII). Andrew Marc is a luxury apparel line focused primarily on men's and women's outerwear.
